dialogues.text:
Hey... What am I supposed to do now?
There’s no more way forward.

...
Analysis concluded. The surface is similar to
the clusters you previously redirected.
So, I can move this entire surface?

Negative. But given the nature of your ability,
you could probably pass through it without
destroying it.

Great. I hate these sandy surfaces...
I end up feeling like I have debris all over
me, even with the suit on.

To minimize discomfort after immersion, avoid
emerging onto surfaces with abrasive or
unstable characteristics.

Right... Jumping straight into spikes or lava
isn’t what I had in mind... Thanks.
